waiting.title: Power on Your Charge HR
waiting.body: Press and hold the button for 3 seconds.

still-waiting.title: Is your Charge HR powered on?
still-waiting.body: Make sure your Charge HR display turns on when you press its button. If the display doesn’t turn on, charge your device.

multiple-candidates.title: More than one tracker found
multiple-candidates.body:
If there are other trackers nearby, move them away.

Make sure your Charge HR is nearby.

code-input.title: Enter the number you see on your Charge HR

edit-greeting.title: How do you want your Charge HR to greet you?

preparation.title: Final setup
preparation.body: Keep your Charge close to your {deviceName} for this last step.

searching.title: Searching for your Fitbit Charge
searching.body: Make sure your tracker is nearby.

updating.title: Setting up your Fitbit Charge
updating.body: Hold tight… this can take up to 10 minutes.

done.title: Setup complete!
done.body: Before you go, learn how to wear and use your Charge.

low-battery.title: Your Charge’s battery is too low to continue
low-battery.body: Plug it in and charge it up before trying again.

bluetooth-connection-failure.title: Is your Charge powered on?
bluetooth-connection-failure.body: Make sure its display turns on when you press the button. If nothing happens, plug it into the charger.

orientation.title: Setup complete!
orientation.body: Before you go, learn how to wear and use your Charge HR.

orientation.title: Care tips
orientation.body:
Clean and dry Charge HR regularly - particularly under the band.

Use skin care products sparingly on areas of the wrist covered by Charge HR.

If you notice any signs of irriation or experience discomfort, please discountinue use.

orientation.title: Wearing Charge HR
orientation.body:
For the best heart rate reading, Charge HR should rest a finger’s width below your wristbone and lay flat.

When exercising, tighten the band so that Charge HR doesn’t move around a lot.

orientation.title: View your daily stats
orientation.body: Press the button to see your stats.

orientation.title: Seeing goal progress
orientation.body:
To start, your goal is set to 10,000 steps.

Charge HR buzzes when you reach your goal.

orientation.title: You’re all set!
orientation.body: Now, get movin’ and make your Charge HR happy.

troubleshooting.title: Not working?
troubleshooting.body:
1. If there are other trackers nearby, move them away.
  2. Make sure your Charge HR is nearby.
  3. If your Charge HR doesn’t turn on when you press and hold its button, charge it.
